metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2685 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
SQL injection in Icinga Web API

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

icinga - 1.13.3-2ubuntu0.1
icinga-cgi - 1.13.3-2ubuntu0.1
icinga-cgi-bin - 1.13.3-2ubuntu0.1
icinga-common - 1.13.3-2ubuntu0.1
icinga-core - 1.13.3-2ubuntu0.1
icinga-idoutils - 1.13.3-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icinga package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.3-2ubuntu0.1').
